name: Castles and Cannons
description:
Description:

This is a game where you are a knight protecting the village and the king from evil slimes with your gun. The king was the one who gave you the gun and he told you to "kill every single one of those sticky bastards." This is a platformer developed in GameMaker studio 2.

Controls:

WASD, or arrow keys, space bar, to move and jump

Click left mouse button and hold it to shoot

WASD and arrow keys to navigate the menu and E key, F key, or space bar to accept.

Music for game - https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/29627/
